breakfast.name: Classic Scrambled Eggs with Toast
breakfast.instructions: Whisk eggs with milk and season with salt and pepper. Melt butter in a pan over medium heat, add eggs, and stir gently until just set. Serve with toasted bread.

lunch.name: Turkey and Cheese Sandwich
lunch.instructions: Layer turkey, cheese, lettuce, and tomato between bread slices. Add mayo or mustard if desired. Serve with chips or fruit.

dinner.name: Garlic Butter Chicken with Rice
dinner.instructions: Season and pan-fry chicken in butter with minced garlic until golden and cooked through, about 6-7 minutes per side. Cook rice according to package directions and steam broccoli. Serve chicken over rice with broccoli on the side.

breakfast.name: Oatmeal with Banana and Honey
breakfast.instructions: Cook oats with milk in microwave for 2-3 minutes or on stovetop until creamy. Top with sliced banana and drizzle with honey.

lunch.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
lunch.instructions: Chop lettuce and place in bowl. Top with sliced leftover chicken, croutons, and parmesan. Toss with caesar dressing and serve.

dinner.name: Spaghetti with Meat Sauce
dinner.instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package directions. Brown ground beef with diced onion and garlic, then add marinara sauce and simmer 10 minutes. Serve meat sauce over pasta.

breakfast.name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
breakfast.instructions: Layer yogurt, berries, and granola in a bowl or glass. Drizzle with honey and serve immediately.

lunch.name: Grilled Cheese and Tomato Soup
lunch.instructions: Butter bread slices and place cheese between them. Grill in pan over medium heat until golden on both sides. Heat tomato soup according to can directions and serve alongside sandwich.

dinner.name: Baked Salmon with Roasted Vegetables
dinner.instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F. Place salmon and chopped vegetables on a baking sheet, drizzle with olive oil, season, and squeeze lemon over salmon. Bake for 15-18 minutes until salmon flakes easily.

breakfast.name: Pancakes with Maple Syrup
breakfast.instructions: Mix pancake mix, milk, and egg until just combined. Heat butter in pan and pour batter to make 3-4 pancakes. Cook until bubbles form, flip, and cook until golden. Serve with maple syrup.

lunch.name: Chicken Quesadilla
lunch.instructions: Layer chicken, cheese, diced peppers, and onions on one tortilla, top with second tortilla. Cook in pan over medium heat until golden and cheese melts, about 3 minutes per side. Cut into wedges.

dinner.name: Beef Stir-Fry with Rice
dinner.instructions: Cook rice according to package directions. Slice beef thinly and stir-fry in hot pan with garlic for 3-4 minutes. Add vegetables and soy sauce, cook 5 minutes more. Serve over rice.

breakfast.name: Veggie Omelet
breakfast.instructions: Whisk eggs and season. Sauté diced peppers and onions in butter, pour eggs over, and cook until almost set. Add cheese, fold omelet in half, and cook 1 more minute.

lunch.name: BLT Sandwich
lunch.instructions: Cook bacon until crispy. Toast bread and spread with mayo. Layer bacon, lettuce, and tomato between bread slices and serve.

dinner.name: Roast Chicken with Potatoes
dinner.instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F. Toss chicken and quartered potatoes with olive oil, minced garlic, rosemary, salt, and pepper. Roast for 35-40 minutes until chicken is cooked through and potatoes are golden.

breakfast.name: French Toast
breakfast.instructions: Whisk eggs and milk with cinnamon. Dip bread slices in mixture and cook in buttered pan until golden on both sides, about 3 minutes per side. Serve with maple syrup.

lunch.name: Tuna Salad Sandwich
lunch.instructions: Drain tuna and mix with mayo, salt, and pepper. Spread on bread and top with lettuce and tomato. Serve with chips or fruit.

dinner.name: Pork Chops with Green Beans
dinner.instructions: Season pork chop and pan-fry in butter for 4-5 minutes per side until cooked through. Sauté green beans with garlic in same pan for 5 minutes. Squeeze lemon over everything and serve.

breakfast.name: Breakfast Burrito
breakfast.instructions: Scramble eggs with diced peppers and onions. Warm tortilla, fill with eggs and cheese, then fold into burrito. Serve with salsa if desired.

lunch.name: Caprese Salad with Bread
lunch.instructions: Slice mozzarella and tomato, arrange on plate alternating with basil leaves. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar, season with salt and pepper. Serve with crusty bread.

dinner.name: Shrimp Tacos
dinner.instructions: Season shrimp and sauté in olive oil for 2-3 minutes per side until pink. Warm tortillas and fill with shrimp and shredded cabbage. Squeeze lime juice over tacos and serve.
